utils module¶

utils.add_time(init_time, time_delta)¶

Adds a time_delta to a time object.

Parameters

  • init_time (datetime.time) – the starting time

  • time_delta (datetime.time_delta) – the time_delta

Returns

the sum

Return type

datetime.time

utils.str_to_time(s, fmt)¶

Parses a string into a time object

Parameters

  • s (string) – the string to parse

  • fmt (string) – the format

Returns

the parsed time object

Return type

datetime.time

utils.time_diff(t1, t2)¶

Calculates the difference of two datetime.time objects

Parameters

  • t1 (datetime.time) – the minuend

  • t2 (datetime.time) – the subtrahend

Returns

the difference

Return type

datetime.time_delta

utils.time_str(t, fmt)¶

Formats a time object as a string.

Parameters

  • t (datetime.time) – the time object

  • fmt (string) – the format

Returns

the formatted time object

Return type

string

Converts a time object to a datetime object.

the datetime object
